scripts.esm-example: npm run build --workspace client && npm run esm-example --workspace examples
scripts.test:esm-example: npm run build --workspace client && npm run test:esm-example --workspace tests
scripts.commonjs-example: npm run build --workspace client && npm run commonjs-example --workspace examples
scripts.test:commonjs-example: npm run build --workspace client && npm run test:commonjs-example --workspace tests
